mapper.sql: goodsid, goodsname, inventory, supid, supname, supbrand, supaddress, goodsprice

mapper.update:
update goods
goodsname = #{goodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inventory = #{inventory,jdbcType=INTEGER},
supid = #{supid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
supname = #{supname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supbrand = #{supbrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supaddress = #{supaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goodsprice = #{goodsprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where goodsid = #{goodsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
